name: android-linter
description: Android linting and error detection for Kotlin/Java projects using Gradle

commands.title: Android: Install Debug Build on Device

android-linter.lintOnOpen.description: Run lint when opening a file

android-linter.lintOnSave.description: Run lint when saving a file

android-linter.lintOnChange.description: Run lint when changing a file (may impact performance)

android-linter.gradlePath.description: Path to gradlew executable (relative to workspace root)

android-linter.showSeverity.description: Which severity levels to show in the Problems panel

android-linter.lintTimeout.description: Timeout for lint operations in milliseconds

android-linter.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before running lint after changes

android-linter.verboseLogging.description: Enable verbose logging to the output channel for debugging

android-linter.launchModule.description: Gradle module that contains the Android application

android-linter.launchApplicationId.description: Override the applicationId used for deployment and logcat

android-linter.launchRememberApplication.description: Remember manually entered applicationId in workspace settings

android-linter.launchInstallTask.description: Gradle task used to install the debug build

android-linter.launchInstallTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for the Gradle install task in milliseconds

android-linter.logcatLevel.description: Minimum log level when streaming logcat

android-linter.logcatAutoClear.description: Clear device logcat buffer before starting a new session

android-linter.logcatAutoStartOnLaunch.description: Automatically start logcat after launching the app

android-linter.logcatPidWaitTimeoutMs.description: How long to wait for the app process before applying PID filtering

android-linter.logcatPidPollIntervalMs.description: Interval between PID checks while waiting for the app process

android-linter.gradleStopDaemonsOnIdle.description: Stop Gradle daemons after a period of inactivity

android-linter.gradleDaemonIdleTimeoutMs.description: Idle time in milliseconds before Gradle daemons are stopped

android-linter.gradleJvmArgs.description: Additional JVM arguments to pass to Gradle daemons

android-linter.gradleMaxWorkers.description: Limit Gradle max workers (0 uses Gradle default)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
